Name

Crit Effect

Type
Overwhelming Smash Triple damage.

Bludgeoning
Nicked an Artery Normal damage. The target takes 2d6 persistent bleed damage.

Piercing
Care your Initials Normal damage. The target is so humiliated it can do nothing but attack you. At the end of each of its turns, it can attempt a Will save to end this effect.

Slashing
Distraction The target is flat-footed until the end of its next turn.

Bomb or Spell
